Description: I Designed Gelato House Franchise Ltd's ice cream ordering app over a four-month period. Created a user-friendly four-step flow for customizing and ordering ice cream. Conducted landscape analysis and user research to align features with user needs. Utilized Figma for prototyping, and Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop for final designs.

I Developed the website you are currently browsing, using React. Designed the layout in Figma and implemented it using React's component-based architecture. Focused on creating an engaging user experience with a clean aesthetic to effectively showcase my work. Implemented responsive design for optimal viewing across devices.

Redesigned the Twilight Clinic website as my second coding project. Aimed for a simple, clean, and elegant look. Created the initial design in Figma, then built the site using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented professional coding practices such as custom properties and utility classes to improve code quality and maintainability.

Conceptualized a redesign for the Flystein website landing page. Conducted competitor research and reviewed published articles on travel industry user trends. Used this information to inform the design process. Created a new version of the landing page using Adobe XD, focusing on improving user experience and visual appeal.
